title: Old Account does not work
body: Well I just created a new account because I could not log into my old account. I have no idea why this is. I believe I got hacked or just can't log in for some reason.

replies.body:
Since account access would likely involve discussing of personal information, it's not something we would be able to solve on the boards.

With that said, if you think you may have had your account compromised, go ahead and [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll take a look to see what's going on :)
